Class FlounderGuis

  • java.lang.Object

    public class FlounderGuis
extends java.lang.Object
implements IModule
    A manager that manages GUI textures in a container.

                         float relX,
                         float relY,
                         float relScaleX,
                         float relScaleY)
        Adds a component to the screen container.
        Parameters:
        component - The component to add,
        relX - The X pos relative to the container.
        relY - The Y pos relative to the container.
        relScaleX - The X scale relative to the container.
        relScaleY - The Y scale relative to the container.
